text:
Raspberry Tea

A cozy room, Razumihin eats soup.  
Nastasya sips tea with sugar.  
Razumihin: “Make him raspberry tea!”  

Nastasya: “Where will she get raspberries?”  
Razumihin: “At the shop, my dear.”  

Nastasya: “You’re quite the planner!”  
Razumihin: “I tracked you down, Rodya!”  

Nastasya: “He knows everything now.”  
Razumihin: “All your affairs, brother!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin recounts his efforts to find Rodya after he disappeared, revealing that he has learned about all of Rodya's affairs during his search.
